definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Still, the list of those caught pleases Mr Sherif.
sentences.chinese: 不過，已被捕獲的人員名單還是能另謝里夫滿意的。

sentences.english: Yet Sharif and its ilk continue to thrive.
sentences.chinese: 然而謝里夫及其同類大學繼續茁壯成長。

sentences.english: El-Sherif had already been remanded into custody for 15 days for the corruption probe.
sentences.chinese: 謝里夫已被要求拘留15天以備腐敗調查。

sentences.english: The letter of response is also an indication of the arrogance of the Aberdeen Sheriff.
sentences.chinese: 信的反應，也是對香港仔謝里夫傲慢的跡象。

sentences.english: 'We have to allow for the law to take its course, ' said Ahsan Iqbal, a spokesman for Mr.
sentences.chinese: “我們必須依法辦事，”謝里夫所在黨派發言人說。

sentences.english: I do want someone else like PML-N.
sentences.chinese: 但我非常支持像謝里夫派這樣的其它黨派。

sentences.english: Sharif said he wanted to come anyway.
sentences.chinese: 謝里夫說，無論怎樣他都會來訪。
